name: powerpoint-slide-viewer
description: PowerPoint Content Add-in that embeds any webpage on a slide via iframe

scripts.deploy: npm run build && git stash && git checkout gh-pages && cp -r dist/* . && git add content.html content.js manifest.xml assets/ && git commit -m 'Deploy to GitHub Pages' && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout main && git stash pop
scripts.generate-certs: mkdir -p certs && cd certs && mkcert localhost
scripts.setup: npm run generate-certs && npm run sideload
